2024-10-07T06:21:15-04:00
We are glad to present you the official
World Tattoo Events ProTeam Tattoo Artists
for 2024.
We gladly support an international group of extremely talented and dedicated professionals, who actively participate and contribute at tattoo conventions all over the world.
If you would like to invite any of the below artists to your show, you are more than welcome to contact them directly.

!!!WE DO NOT ORGANIZE ANY TATTOO CONVENTION!!!
WE ONLY PROMOTE THEM ON THIS WEBSITE!!!
IF YOU NEED BOOTHS, TICKETS OR ANY OTHER INFO REGARDING ANY CONVENTION LISTED ON THIS WEBSITE PLEASE CONTACT THE ORGANIZERS DIRECTLY.
YOU CAN FIND MOST EVENT CONTACT DETAILS ON OUR EVENT PAGES.
YOU CAN ALSO VISIT OUR
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
(FAQ’S) PAGE.

2025-08-19T07:48:24-04:00
READY TO PROMOTE YOUR TATTOO CONVENTION?
You can list your event on this website for
FREE
and it’s searchable on the event calendar.
WANT A BOOST?
We also offer optional paid promo packages (
Professional
,
Social
and
Featured
) to amplify your reach across our platforms.
To ensure your event shines, please submit as much detail as possible, and eye-catching promo images.
Submit today and let’s promote your event to our international tattoo community.
Once your event has been published, you can always request updates or changes by simply mailing us at
info@worldtattooevents.com
or get in touch with us via
Instagram
.
All events submissions will be processed within 24 hours.
DISCLAIMER:
We love showcasing amazing events, but we may decline publication
if the event information is inconsistent or there are concerns about the organizer’s reliability.

The price for each promo package is intended to be from the day of publication until the end of the event!

Alex Van Dutch
2024-10-17T07:47:06-04:00
Complete directory of every tattoo convention (1600+) of the last 5 years. Each convention it’s listed only once, ordered by the last edition dates. Each convention page, contains information of all past editions as well. If you can’t find an event here, please checkout our tattoo conventions
posters archive
.
Please contribute
: if you have any posters or information about tattoo conventions which happened between 1960 to 2010, please email your info to
info@worldtattooevents.com
. We are building the biggest database of tattoo conventions online, to pass on to future generations.

Complete directory of every tattoo convention (1600+) of the last 5 years. Each convention it’s listed only once, ordered by the last edition dates. Each convention page, contains information of all past editions as well. If you can’t find an event here, please checkout our tattoo conventions
posters archive
.
Please contribute
: if you have any posters or information about tattoo conventions which happened between 1960 to 2010, please email your info to
info@worldtattooevents.com
. We are building the biggest database of tattoo conventions online, to pass on to future generations.
